original_text: “This is what the Sovereign Lord says: ‘Because Edom took revenge on Judah and became very guilty by doing so,
korean_text: 주 여호와께서 이같이 말씀하셨느니라 에돔이 유다 족속을 쳐서 원수를 갚았고 원수를 갚음으로 심히 범죄하였도다

sentences.original_text: This is what the Sovereign Lord says:
Because Edom took revenge on Judah
and became very guilty by doing so,
sentences.korean_translation: 그렇게 함으로 매우 죄가 되었기 때문입니다,
